actions.in_committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation

official_title: A bill to provide that the Federal Aviation Administration shall only perform functions relating to aviation safety, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to declare that the Federal Aviation Administration shall only perform functions relating to aviation safety, except for the development and construction of a civil supersonic aircraft. Transfers to the Secretary of Transportation all functions of the Administration that do not pertain to aviation safety.

titles.title: A bill to provide that the Federal Aviation Administration shall only perform functions relating to aviation safety, and for other purposes.
